text: The Victims of Terrorist Attack on the Pentagon Memorial is a memorial dedicated to the victims of the September 11 attacks 2001 on The Pentagon. The memorial is shaped as a pentagon. It has the names of the victims of the attack by the American Airlines Flight 77 and the victims who died in the building. The memorial was opened in 2002 in the section of the victims graves at the Arlington National Cemetery. == Other websites == * Arlington National Cemetery Category:Arlington National Cemetery Category:September 11 attacks Category:2002 establishments in the United States Category:21st-century establishments in Virginia Category:Victims of the September 11 attacks
title: Victims of Terrorist Attack on the Pentagon Memorial
